business_info.businessDescription: Sound healing sessions for overwhelmed women seeking sacred pauses for the soul. Former anxious hairdresser turned sound healer, helping women go from racing minds to peaceful hearts.
business_info.targetAudience: Women who give to everyone else but struggle to give to themselves - overwhelmed, anxious, running on empty

services.name: Private 1-to-1 Sound Healing
services.description: Completely personalized healing experience with crystal singing bowls, chakra balancing, gentle touch therapy with essential oils

services.name: Group Sound Bath Sessions
services.description: Sound healing in stunning natural locations with guided meditation and crystal energy

services.name: Private Group Cacao Ceremonies
services.description: Sacred cacao ceremony with crystal bowl sound healing journey and heart-opening connection

services.name: Celebration Ceremonies
services.description: Customized ceremonies for special moments with sound healing and ritual elements

shannon_murray_complete_account.brand_aesthetic: Calm, spiritual, natural - warm coastal tones with healing and peaceful energy
bio_options: Sacred Pause Focus: I create sacred pauses for the soul in a world that never stops
Transformation Story: From anxious hairdresser to sound healer - I know the journey from overwhelm to peace
Mission Statement: Helping overwhelmed women find their way back to calm through healing sessions
